titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress regarding textbook equity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 7/28/2006--Introduced. Expresses the sense of Congress that all students deserve up-to-date textbooks in order to meet national education requirements and that states should ensure that poorer school districts are not deprived of such textbooks. Resolves that primary and secondary schools receive equitable funding for textbooks.
